titleStmt.title: A declaration of the Lords & Commons in Parliament concerning a printed paper intitled A letter sent from the Kings Majesty to the lords of the Privy Counsell of the kingdome of Scotland : as also, another paper in forme of a petition directed to the lords of His Majesty [sic] Privy Counsell.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Iohn Franke and Edward Husbands,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard Law School Library.
